```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(modelr)
```


## Problem 1

### Load and clean data

```{r}
birth_weight = 
  read_csv("data/birthweight.csv")
```

**Check for missing Value**
```{r}
sum(is.na(birth_weight))
```

This data has no missing values


**Convert some variables to factors**

```{r, message = FALSE}
birth_weight =
  birth_weight %>% 
  mutate(
    babysex = recode_factor(babysex, "1" = "male", "2" = "female"),
    frace = recode_factor(frace, "1" = "White", "2" = "Black", "3" = "Asian", "4" = "Puerto Rican", "8" = "Other", "9" = "Unkown"),
    mrace = recode_factor(mrace, "1" = "White", "2" = "Black", "3" = "Asian", "4" = "Puerto Rican", "8" = "Other"),
    malform = recode_factor(malform, "0" = "absent", "1" = "present" )
  )
```
